title: Designing Function Learning Through Visual Representation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic algebra and graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, strengthening real-world problem-solving abilities through enhanced visual representation of functions.

learning_goals: Learners can convert between graphical, tabular, and contextual representations of functions.
Learners can visually analyze and predict changes in functions using dynamic geometry software
Learners can explain core concepts of functions (domain, codomain, and mapping relationships) through visual representations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
